description: Describes an existing AWS VPC configuration to install a Kubernetes cluster into.
title: AWS VPC Configuration

___route_table_id.description: DEPRECATED: id of a pre-created route table that exists in the provided vpc.id

___default_security_group_id.description: id of the pre-created default security group for the provided vpc.id

___subnet.description: list of subnet ids that are part of the provided vpc.id

$eref.description: Identifies an [AWS subnet](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonVPC/latest/UserGuide/VPC_Subnets.html) that is not managed by K2.
$eref.title: AWS Subnet Identification

___name.description: The name of the subnet, for use within k2 configurations.

___id.description: AWS id of the pre-existing subnet.
